name: Booksack
description: Select some number of books from a collection of books such that the sum of weight of selected books is maximum.

name: Meeting People
description: Inform the maximum number of individuals about the ongoing events.

name: Fest Scheduling
description: As a volunteer in a college fest, try to minimize the number of similar events which occur in the same time slot.

name: Even More Pizza
description: Problem from the Practice Round of Google Hash Code 2021.
